verses.verse: וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> vai-yag-Ged told אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> 'ach-'Av And Ahab לְאִיזֶ֔בֶל <WH348> le-'i-Ze-vel, Jezebel אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher and how עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah had done אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> 'e-li-Ya-hu; all that Elijah וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher and how הָרַ֛ג <WH2026> ha-Rag and withal how he had slain אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im all the prophets בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> be-Cha-rev. with the sword

וַתִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vat-tish-Lach sent אִיזֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH348> 'i-Ze-vel Then Jezebel מַלְאָ֔ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach, a messenger אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <WH452> 'e-li-Ya-hu unto Elijah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- So יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <WH6213> ya-'a-Sun do אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him So let the gods וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> ve-Choh and even יוֹסִפ֔וּן <WH3254> yo-si-Fun, [to me] and more כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- if כָעֵ֤ת <WH6256> cha-'Et about this time מָחָר֙ <WH4279> ma-Char of them by to morrow אָשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> 'a-Sim also if I make אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשְׁךָ֔ <WH5315> naf-she-Cha, not thy life כְּנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> ke-Ne-fesh as the life אַחַ֥ד <WH259> 'a-Chad of one מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> me-Hem. like

וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar, And when he saw וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom [that] he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and ran אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> naf-Sho, for his life וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> She-va' to Beersheba אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> li-hu-Dah; which [belongeth] to Judah וַיַּנַּ֥ח <WH3240> vai-yan-Nach and left אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- נַעֲר֖וֹ <WH5288> na-'a-Ro his servant שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there

וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> ve-hu- himself הָלַ֤ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach But he himself went בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech journey י֔וֹם <WH3117> Yom, a day's וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came וַיֵּ֕שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev and sat down תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under רֹ֣תֶם <WH7574> Ro-tem juniper tree; אֶחָת 'e-chat כאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; a קוַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> vai-yish-'Al and he requested אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> naf-Sho for himself לָמ֔וּת <WH4191> la-Mut, that he might die וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said רַ֗ב <WH7227> Rav, It is enough עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah now יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh now O LORD קַ֣ח <WH3947> kach take away נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> naf-Shi, my life כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- I am not ט֥וֹב <WH2896> Tov for I [am] not better אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi my מֵאֲבֹתָֽי׃ <WH1> me-'a-vo-Tai. than my fathers

וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> vai-yish-Kav And as he lay וַיִּישַׁ֔ן <WH3462> vai-yi-Shan, and slept תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under רֹ֣תֶם <WH7574> Ro-tem juniper tree אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; under a וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and behold זֶ֤ה <WH2088> zeh there מַלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> mal-'oCh behold then an angel נֹגֵ֣עַ <WH5060> no-Ge-a' touched בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer him and said ל֖וֹ lo ק֥וּם <WH6965> kum unto him Arise אֱכֽוֹל׃ <WH398> e-Chol. [and] eat

וַיַּבֵּ֕ט <WH5027> vai-yab-Bet And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <WH4763> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav at his head עֻגַ֥ת <WH5692> 'u-Gat and behold [there was] a cake רְצָפִ֖ים <WH7529> re-tza-Fim baken on the coals וְצַפַּ֣חַת <WH6835> ve-tzap-Pa-chat and a cruse מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; of water וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> vai-Yo-chal And he did eat וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <WH8354> vai-Ye-shet, and drink וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov again וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <WH7901> vai-yish-Kav. and laid him down

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shav came again מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD שֵׁנִית֙ <WH8145> she-Nit the second time וַיִּגַּע־ <WH5060> vai-yig-ga'- and touched בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer him and said ק֣וּם <WH6965> kum Arise אֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> 'e-Chol; [and] eat כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki because רַ֥ב <WH7227> rav [is] too great מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha is too הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> had-Da-rech. because the journey

וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom And he arose וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> vai-Yo-chal and did eat וַיִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> vai-yish-Teh; and drink וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech and went בְּכֹ֣חַ׀ <WH3581> be-Cho-ach in the strength הָאֲכִילָ֣ה <WH396> ha-'a-chi-Lah of that meat הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> ha-Hi, he אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יוֹם֙ <WH3117> yOm days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah, nights עַ֛ד <WH5704> 'ad against הַ֥ר <WH2022> har the mount הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God חֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> cho-Rev. unto Horeb

וַיָּבֹא־ <WH935> vai-ya-vo- And he came שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> sham there אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> ham-me-'a-Rah thither unto a cave וַיָּ֣לֶן <WH3885> vai-Ya-len and lodged שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; there וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- there and behold the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer [came] to him and he said ל֔וֹ lo, מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What לְּךָ֥ le-Cha פֹ֖ה <WH6311> foh here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer And he said קַנֹּ֨א <WH7065> kan-No I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <WH7065> kin-Ne-ti jealous לַיהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָזְב֤וּ <WH5800> 'a-ze-Vu have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> ve-ri-te-Cha thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH4196> miz-be-cho-Tei-cha thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <WH2040> ha-Ra-su, thrown down וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei-cha thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <WH2026> ha-re-Gu and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> ve-Cha-rev; with the sword וָֽאִוָּתֵ֤ר <WH3498> va-'iv-va-Ter and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni and I לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> le-vad-Di, alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> vay-vak-Shu and they seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> le-kach-Tah. to take it away

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said צֵ֣א <WH3318> tze Go forth וְעָמַדְתָּ֣ <WH5975> ve-'a-mad-Ta and stand בָהָר֮ <WH2022> va-Har upon the mount לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And behold the LORD עֹבֵ֗ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver, passed by וְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> ve-Ru-ach wind גְּדוֹלָ֡ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah and a great וְחָזָ֞ק <WH2389> ve-cha-Zak and strong מְפָרֵק֩ <WH6561> me-fa-Rek rent הָרִ֨ים <WH2022> ha-Rim the mountains וּמְשַׁבֵּ֤ר <WH7665> u-me-shab-Ber and brake in pieces סְלָעִים֙ <WH5553> se-la-'Im the rocks לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not בָר֖וּחַ <WH7307> va-Ru-ach [was] not in the wind יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֤ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char and after הָר֨וּחַ <WH7307> ha-Ru-ach the wind רַ֔עַשׁ <WH7494> Ra-'ash, an earthquake לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not בָרַ֖עַשׁ <WH7494> va-Ra-'ash [was] not in the earthquake יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. [but] the LORD

וְאַחַ֤ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char And after הָרַ֙עַשׁ֙ <WH7494> ha-Ra-'ash the earthquake אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, a fire לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not בָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> va-'Esh [was] not in the fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> ve-'a-Char and after הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh, the fire ק֖וֹל <WH6963> Kol voice דְּמָמָ֥ה <WH1827> de-ma-Mah a still דַקָּֽה׃ <WH1851> dak-Kah. small

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> kish-Mo-a' heard אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <WH452> 'e-li-Ya-hu, And it was [so] when Elijah וַיָּ֤לֶט <WH3874> vai-Ya-let [it] that he wrapped פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> pa-Nav his face בְּאַדַּרְתּ֔וֹ <WH155> be-'ad-dar-To, in his mantle וַיֵּצֵ֕א <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze and went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod and stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach in the entering in הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <WH4631> ham-me-'a-Rah; of the cave וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav about ק֔וֹל <WH6963> Kol, And behold [there came] a voice וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer unto him and said מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What לְּךָ֥ le-Cha פֹ֖ה <WH6311> foh here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer And he said קַנֹּ֨א <WH7065> kan-No I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <WH7065> kin-Ne-ti jealous לַיהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָזְב֤וּ <WH5800> 'a-ze-Vu have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <WH1285> ve-ri-te-Cha thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei because the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH4196> miz-be-cho-Tei-cha thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <WH2040> ha-Ra-su, thrown down וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei-cha thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <WH2026> ha-re-Gu and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> ve-Cha-rev; with the sword וָאִוָּתֵ֤ר <WH3498> va-'iv-va-Ter and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni and I לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> le-vad-Di, alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> vay-vak-Shu and they seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3947> le-kach-Tah. to take it away ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> lech Go שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> shuv return לְדַרְכְּךָ֖ <WH1870> le-dar-ke-Cha on thy way מִדְבַּ֣רָה <WH4057> mid-Ba-rah to the wilderness דַמָּ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> dam-Ma-sek; of Damascus וּבָ֗אתָ <WH935> u-Va-ta, and when thou comest וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֧ <WH4886> u-ma-shach-Ta anoint אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲזָאֵ֛ל <WH2371> cha-za-'El Hazael לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech [to be] king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over אֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> 'a-Ram. over Syria

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> ye-Hu And Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <WH5250> nim-Shi, of Nimshi תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> tim-Shach shalt thou anoint לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech [to be] king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלִישָׁ֤ע <WH477> 'e-li-Sha' and Elisha בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שָׁפָט֙ <WH8202> sha-Fat of Shaphat מֵאָבֵ֣ל me-'a-Vel מְחוֹלָ֔ה <WH65> me-cho-Lah, of Abelmeholah תִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> tim-Shach shalt thou anoint לְנָבִ֖יא <WH5030> le-na-Vi [to be] prophet תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH8478> tach-Tei-cha. your place
